title: elevates
author: elevates
content: The ability to completely transform the way this world operates might get changed because of Bitcoin. I believe apart from financial security it may change today's life which is the difficulties and uncertainty of the future. Everything happening around Bitcoin now is only a building block of progress and innovation. For me, Bitcoin is my guide in the pursuit of financial freedom and supremacy.Why do I feel I am on the right path? Staying curious, staying informed, and staying optimistic are the three pillars of my success now and will be in the future too. I know my future is bright as I was one of many who liked the concept, and who dared to dream, in the end, acted on my beliefs. For me, Bitcoin has been a force to be reckoned with as it has been disrupting traditional financial systems and empowering individuals like me to take control of my wealth.Why do I think Bitcoin is unstoppable?As it is decentralized and immune to external forces. It is a more valuable asset than a bar of gold. To everyone who is seeking financial freedom and protection against ongoing inflation, Bitcoin is the best investment. As fiat has always been a shady currency.Finance is always Risky!Bitcoin privileges come with a unique set of difficulties and uncertainties, much like every innovative technology. One of the big concerns is losing everything that you have invested. It has been more than a decade and Bitcoin is still going strong. As a newbie be prepared for the ups & downs. Always do your own research and then make a decision. Ultimate Goal!My ultimate goal can be only achieved through Bitcoin. This will happen when I go to any big store and pick up anything without thinking about how much I have in my wallet. I am not someone who is looking for a Lambo. I am someone who is going after complete Financial independence.Do you believe in what I believe?

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Since this discussion is focused on bitcoin i will advise you move the thread to bitcoin discussion, we have many reasons to make us lay hold to bitcoin and as long as the first decision had been made with the choice of going for bitcoin among many cryptocurrencies, because bitcoin is the first and well recognized digital currency, if you learn and hodl, you will not regret your decision, you will also have to learn about some security measures in dealing with preferred wallet type against hackers or centralized institutions such as exchanges.

comments.author: BitDane
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on April 07, 2023, 01:24:20 PMWhy do I think Bitcoin is unstoppable?As it is decentralized and immune to external forces. It is a more valuable asset than a bar of gold. To everyone who is seeking financial freedom and protection against ongoing inflation, Bitcoin is the best investment. As fiat has always been a shady currency.Bitcoin network is unstoppable yes, but Bitcoin application and acceptance isn't.  It only needs a notice of regulation from the authority to make Bitcoin transaction illegal and all the centralized exchanges and company that is involved in Bitcoin will stop its acceptance or operation.  It maybe used in an underground trades or dark market but the mainstream adoption of Bitcoin will definitely stop once the authority prohibit the transaction of Bitcoin.Bitcoin mainstream adoption is not untouchable, it is still affected by the government regulation, the only reason why Bitcoin adoption grow is because the government is being lenient to Bitcoin users.Quote from: elevates on April 07, 2023, 01:24:20 PM Ultimate Goal!My ultimate goal can be only achieved through Bitcoin. This will happen when I go to any big store and pick up anything without thinking about how much I have in my wallet. I am not someone who is looking for a Lambo. I am someone who is going after complete Financial independence.Do you believe in what I believe?   I believe that anyone who is hardworking and working smart will be able to get financial freedom regardless of the presence of Bitcoin.  I don't think that Bitcoin is the only thing to achieve your goal  I believe the main factor of your success is your own perseverance,  Bitcoin is just a neutral tool.  You become successful in trading not because of Bitcoin but because of your skills in trading.  If you happen to find a job that pay in Bitcoin, it is not Bitcoin that gives you the opportunity but the employer that accepted you and it is not Bitcoin that made you get qualified for the jobs but because of your own set of skill.  Your financial freedom will not be given by Bitcoin but rather you can claim it through your own effort and endeavors.QuoteFor me, Bitcoin is my guide in the pursuit of financial freedom and supremacy.What if Bitcoin price stagnate?  Do you still think that it will be your guide to pursuit financial freedom?

My plan is not about making bitcoin available as a way to spend in the public, I wish fiat to remain in that position. I can be able to just convert my bitcoin to fiat and spend if I want to, while I also have the privilege to save bitcoin. I see it hard for me at times to spend my bitcoin because I know it's value will still increase, but I can be able to easily spend fiat or convert it to bitcoin.Quote from: BitDane on April 08, 2023, 07:36:14 AMWhat if Bitcoin price stagnate?  Do you still think that it will be your guide to pursuit financial freedom?Can the price of bitcoin be stagnant? No. Although I do not advice anyone to believe that bitcoin can give financial freedom, but it can give the freedom that the centralized system can not give, it gives the freedom that fiat can not give, which is the freedom for you to be able to fully control your own money by yourself and not by any central body.

comments.author: Hypnosis00
comments.body: I would say that just believe those things that you think it was believable and worthy. I invest in Bitcoin because I have faith and trust that this will give me benefits and rewards someday and fortunately, it gives me more than what I think. People see the potentiality of Bitcoin and that is why they invest despite the risk. But don't get too dependent on this stuff, we can somehow become financially stable without Bitcoin as well. And talking about adoption OP, it can take time (years) before we reach that level. Accepting Bitcoin is still on way far from getting the #1 payment option as only a few stores are accepting this across the globe.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: The very name of this forum says that people who really believe in the potential of Bitcoin gather here  However, financial freedom can be achieved in many different ways, including trading with different cryptocurrencies.The mere fact that bitcoin has potential won't help you if you don't know how to use that potential in the best way.It is important to analyze the crypto market and market trends well and make the best possible investment decisions, in accordance with your personal and financial situation.

So as some who seeks and truly desire to have and preserve my wealth for years to come, bitcoin is a viable investment option. Following the OP's argument, another upside for me that has strengthen my belief in bitcoin is that we are now seeing an increasing number of adoption as a legitimate asset class. It only means one thing, its value and stability will over time keep  increasing, there serving as a potential pathway to financial independence for those who embrace it.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on April 07, 2023, 01:24:20 PMTo everyone who is seeking financial freedom and protection against ongoing inflation, Bitcoin is the best investment. As fiat has always been a shady currency.Bitcoin is not a silver bullet for achieving financial freedom. If you government banned Bitcoin, you won't be able to use it to buy a house, which requires government registration, spend it legally, etc. And rich people are not relying on Bitcoin to protect their wealth, they have offshore accounts for that. Bitcoin's anti-inflation is impossible to measure. The last 3 years saw big rise in inflation, and Bitcoin had a lot of up and down movements in this period, instead of only going up and up.A good investment is the one that has high returns and low risks. Bitcoin has high risks and very high returns, so it's not an objectively good investment. You can't recommend Bitcoin to everyone.

comments.author: Ndabagi01

I am someone who is going after complete Financial independence.Do you believe in what I believe?   I may believe what you believe, but our perspectives on bitcoin may differ in some ways. We all have an ultimate goal in this world; you just stated that yours can be achieved through bitcoin and that you are hoping for it to be so. As much as we want bitcoin to be widely adopted, we also want our bitcoin savings to grow, which is why we diversify into bitcoin investments.
